title: Bei Wa Xue Yingyu Hai Xiao Qiche
title_japanese: 贝瓦学英语 嗨 小汽车
synopsis: Bewa Learn English: Hi, Car" is a children's cognitive animation designed and produced for babies between 0 and 3 years old. The little beaver will have a series of interesting stories with the transportation: the excavator helps him build the castle; the road sweeper teaches him not to litter; the crane completes the Christmas tree with him; the helicopter takes him to the sky... Come and learn about the appearance, functions and words of various vehicles with the little beaver (translated from iqiyi)
